\n \n \n Test Domain Tree Obsolete Tree\n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n
Test Domain Tree Obsolete Value
open${base_url}/foo_module/FooModule_createObjects
assertTextPresentCreated Successfully.
open${base_url}/foo_module/Zuite_waitForActivities
assertTextPresentDone.
open${base_url}/foo_module/FooModule_viewFooList/listbox/ListBox_setPropertyList?field_domain_tree=checked;field_domain_root_list=parent_domain%7CParent
assertTextPresentSet Successfully.
open${base_url}/foo_module/view
assertElementNotPresentdomain_root_url
clickAndWait//input[@class="listbox-tree-domain-tree-mode"]
verifySelecteddomain_root_urlParent
verifyText//table[@class="listbox-table-domain-tree"]//tr[1]//a[@class="tree-closed"]Title 0
verifyText//table[@class="listbox-table-domain-tree"]//tr[2]//a[@class="tree-closed"]Title 1
verifyText//span[@class="listbox-current-page-total-number"]10
verifyText//tr[@class="listbox-data-line-0 DataA"]/td[2]0
verifyText//tr[@class="listbox-data-line-1 DataB"]/td[2]1
verifyText//tr[@class="listbox-data-line-2 DataA"]/td[2]2
clickAndWait//table[@class="listbox-table-domain-tree"]//tr[1]//a[@class="tree-closed"]
verifySelecteddomain_root_urlParent
verifyText//table[@class="listbox-table-domain-tree"]//tr[1]//a[@class="tree-open"]Title 0
verifyText//table[@class="listbox-table-domain-tree"]//tr[2]//a[@class="tree-closed"]Title 1
verifyText//table[@class="listbox-table-domain-tree"]//tr[3]//a[@class="tree-closed"]Title 2
verifyText//table[@class="listbox-table-domain-tree"]//tr[4]//a[@class="tree-closed"]Title 3
verifyText//span[@class="listbox-current-page-total-number"]1
verifyText//tr[@class="listbox-data-line-0 DataA"]/td[2]0
open${base_url}/foo_module/FooModule_deleteObjectList
assertTextPresentDeleted Successfully.
open${base_url}/foo_module/view
verifyText//table[@class="listbox-table-domain-tree"]//tr[1]//a[@class="tree-closed"]Title 1
verifyText//table[@class="listbox-table-domain-tree"]//tr[2]//a[@class="tree-closed"]Title 2
verifyText//span[@class="listbox-current-page-total-number"]9
verifyText//tr[@class="listbox-data-line-0 DataA"]/td[2]1
verifyText//tr[@class="listbox-data-line-1 DataB"]/td[2]2
\n \n \n
